name: UICollectionViewPlaceholder
desc: A placeholder for an item dragged or dropped on a collection view.

items.name: init(insertionIndexPath: IndexPath, reuseIdentifier: String)
items.desc: Creates a placeholder object with the specified index path and reuse identifier.

items.name: var cellUpdateHandler: ((UICollectionViewCell) -> Void)?
items.desc: The block that updates the contents of the placeholder cell.
